title: Navigation Bar Responsive Behavior
description: Verify that the navigation bar adapts correctly to scroll events and screen size changes, including functionality of the hamburger menu on mobile devices.

steps.description: Load the homepage on a desktop screen size.
Check that the navigation bar is visible and displays all navigation links.
Scroll down the page.
Verify the navigation bar responds to scroll events by changing visibility/styling according to design.
Resize the browser window to a mobile screen size (e.g., 375x667).
Check that the navigation bar transforms into a hamburger menu.
Click the hamburger menu.
Verify that the navigation menu is expanded and navigation links are accessible.
Click each navigation link in the expanded menu.
Verify page scrolls smoothly to the corresponding sections.

title: Hero Section Dynamic Elements Functionality
description: Verify that the hero section displays parallax backgrounds, kinetic typography, and floating decorative elements correctly with smooth animations.

steps.description: Load the homepage.
Verify the parallax background moves as expected on scroll.
Check that kinetic typography animates according to specification.
Confirm floating decorative elements animate smoothly without glitches.

title: Intro Section Content Verification
description: Ensure the Intro section properly displays the freediving philosophy and essential information with correct styling.

steps.description: Navigate to the Intro section.
Check that the philosophy text and essential information are present and readable.
Verify styling matches design system tokens for font, colors, and spacing.

title: Statistics Section Display and Content Accuracy
description: Verify that the Stats section displays key freediving metrics correctly with accessible styling.

steps.description: Navigate to the Stats section.
Confirm that all statistics are displayed with correct values and units.
Ensure text and visual elements conform to accessibility standards including color contrast.

title: Courses Section Courses Listing and Details
description: Verify that the frediving courses listing shows all available courses with detailed information as specified.

steps.description: Navigate to the Courses section.
Verify that a list of courses is visible.
Check that each course displays detailed information including title, description, duration, and price.
Test interaction such as expanding or selecting a course if applicable.
Verify the UI updates properly and no content is truncated or distorted.

title: Gallery Section Image Display and Interaction
description: Ensure gallery images are loaded properly, optimized, and user can interact with the gallery as expected.

steps.description: Navigate to the Gallery section.
Verify all gallery images load successfully in WebP or optimized format.
Check each image has meaningful alt text for accessibility.
Click on a gallery image if a lightbox or expanded view is supported.
Confirm the image is displayed enlarged and navigation controls work correctly.

title: Contact Section Form Submission and Validation
description: Verify contact form accepts valid inputs, validates input fields, and submits inquiries successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to the Contact section.
Input valid data into all required fields.
Submit the contact form.
Verify form is submitted and confirmation message or response is displayed.
Input invalid data or leave required fields empty.
Verify proper validation errors are displayed preventing submission.

title: Footer Component Content and Links
description: Check that the footer displays all relevant links, copyright information, and behaves correctly on different devices.

steps.description: Scroll to footer on desktop and mobile screen sizes.
Verify footer content is fully visible without layout issues.
Check all links are present and clickable.
Click each footer link.
Ensure navigation or external linking behaves correctly without errors.

title: Custom Cursor Functionality and Accessibility
description: Verify the custom cursor replaces the default cursor across the app and is accessible without interfering with keyboard navigation.

steps.description: Load the homepage and observe the cursor.
Confirm the custom cursor replaces the default cursor on all interactive elements.
Navigate the app using keyboard (tab key).
Ensure focus rings are visible and keyboard navigation is smooth.
Verify custom cursor does not interfere with accessibility states.

title: Survey System Participation and Results Display
description: Test that users can participate in surveys, submit valid responses, and view updated survey results accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to the survey section.
Verify the survey loads correctly with question and answer options.
Select valid responses in the survey form.
Submit the survey.
Check survey response acceptance and display of results.
Verify results reflect the submitted response accurately.
Try submitting invalid or incomplete responses.
Confirm validation errors prevent submission.

title: Smooth Scrolling and Footer Reveal Behavior
description: Validate that page scrolling is smooth via Lenis and the footer reveal behaves as designed during scroll events.

steps.description: Load the homepage.
Scroll down the page using mouse wheel or trackpad.
Confirm scrolling is smooth without jank or stutter.
Check that the footer reveals smoothly as user reaches the bottom of the page.

title: Design System Compliance Verification
description: Ensure all components strictly follow the design system for color schemes, spacing, fonts, and use CSS classes instead of inline styles.

steps.description: Inspect all UI components for usage of color tokens, font sizes, and spacing values.
Verify no hardcoded inline styles are present, and styles derive from CSS classes or modules.
Check consistency of styling across all screen sizes.

title: Image Optimization and Accessibility
description: Verify that all images are optimized for web, load efficiently, and include proper alt attributes for accessibility.

steps.description: Browse through pages containing images including hero backgrounds and gallery.
Confirm images load quickly and are in WebP or other optimized formats.
Verify each image element has a meaningful alt attribute.

title: Broken Links and Missing Assets Check
description: Ensure there are no broken links or missing assets throughout the application, including favicon and referenced media.

steps.description: Click on all internal and external links in navbar, footer, and content sections.
Verify links navigate correctly without 404 or errors.
Inspect network requests for all assets during page load.
Confirm no 404 or failed resource requests, including images and favicon.

title: Multi-Device Responsive Layout Validation
description: Test the application UI on various screen sizes and devices to ensure layouts and features render correctly without regression.

steps.description: Test on desktop (e.g. 1920x1080), tablet (e.g. 768x1024), and mobile sizes (e.g. 375x667).
Verify that all sections render properly, navigation functions correctly, and no elements are cut off or overlapping.
Rotate devices to landscape and portrait modes.
Confirm consistent and usable UI in all orientations.
